name: Immigration Document Completeness Review
description: Government-grade rubric for evaluating immigration application documents. Ensures compliance with USCIS requirements and maintains audit trails per NIST AI RMF guidelines.

criteria.name: Required Fields Present
criteria.description: All mandatory fields are completed and legible

criteria.name: Document Quality
criteria.description: Documents are clear, properly formatted, and readable

criteria.name: Information Consistency
criteria.description: Information across documents is consistent and matches
